name: Net Error: McKayla is Not Impressed!
description:
Add McKayla is not impressed message and picture on Firefox error page and untrusted page.

Now she also appears on reported web forgery page.

Note: Because of this site's limitation that won't allow me to submit CSS that is more than 64KB, I can't use data:URI for McKayla picture. This makes the picture won't appear when there is no internet connection.

Chose your language below. Can't find your language? Help McKayla learn your language.
